meanings.definition: A woman who receives or entertains guests.
meanings.sent1: The friendly hostess greeted the guests at the door.
meanings.sent2: The hostess served drinks and snacks to the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The hostess made sure everyone felt welcome and comfortable.
meanings.sent4: She was the hostess of the party, ensuring everyone had a great time.
meanings.sent5: The hostess's warm smile made the guests feel right at home.

meanings.definition: A woman who manages a public eating place.
meanings.sent1: The hostess at the restaurant led customers to their tables.
meanings.sent2: The hostess kept track of reservations and seating arrangements.
meanings.sent3: The hostess joked with the chefs in the kitchen while managing the restaurant.
meanings.sent4: She was the hostess of the bustling diner, orchestrating the flow of customers.
meanings.sent5: The hostess efficiently handled the restaurant's operations with grace.
